directions: Place the ground chilies, paprika, and cayenne pepper into a bowl; stir. Add onion powder, ginger, cumin, coriander, cardamom, fenugreek, garlic powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, allspice, and cloves. Gently whisk together until thoroughly mixed.
Store in an airtight container, preferably glass.
ingredients: 1/2 cup ground dried New Mexico chiles
title: Berbere Spice Blend
